## Description {#details}

The implementation for the loop nest analysis.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### checkLoopsStructure() {#aa476d5315e502f74f064165e49a3ff9b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool checkLoopsStructure (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; OuterLoop, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; InnerLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Determine whether the loops structure violates basic requirements for perfect nesting:

<ul>
<li>the inner loop should be the outer loop&#39;s only child</li>
<li>the outer loop header should &#39;flow&#39; into the inner loop preheader or jump around the inner loop to the outer loop latch</li>
<li>if the inner loop latch exits the inner loop, it should &#39;flow&#39; into the outer loop latch. Returns true if the loop structure satisfies the basic requirements and false otherwise.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00315">315</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp">LoopNestAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PotentialOuterLatch == OuterLoopLatch)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If &#96;InnerLoopExit&#96; contains LCSSA Phi instructions, additional block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may be inserted before the &#96;OuterLoopLatch&#96; to which &#96;BI&#96; jumps. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops are still considered perfectly nested if the extra block only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contains Phi instructions from InnerLoopExit and OuterLoopHeader.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InnerLoopExitContainsLCSSA &amp;&amp; IsExtraPhiBlock(&#42;Succ) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">            Succ-&gt;getSingleSuccessor() == OuterLoopLatch) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Points to the extra block so that we can reference it later in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// final check. We can also conclude that the inner loop is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// guarded and there exists LCSSA Phi node in the exit block later if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we see a non-null &#96;ExtraPhiBlock&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">          ExtraPhiBlock = Succ;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
